website_summaries.verdict: A bulky product that is reasonably priced. If you don't mind a bit of maneuvering difficulty and are on a budget, it could be right for you.
pros: Wheels and lighter weight are convenient for in-home use, especially if you stay on the same level
Price is reasonable considering the sturdiness of the product
cons: The wringing process can be cumbersome and messy

customer_reviews.title: Whoever designed this never used it
customer_reviews.text: I've put off sharing this because I couldn't believe it. There's no back panel on the squeeze mechanism. Water jets out from the back of the squeeze plate to the floor. Using the slowest squeeze the dirty water follows the contours of the mechanism and drizzles into the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Adams

customer_reviews.title: THE HINGES ON THE SQUEEZE MECHANISM ARE THIN AS RECYCLED BEER CANS ... THEY WON'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the looks deceive you. This would be a great piece of equipment if the HINGES operating the squeeze weren't made from recycled beer cans. It's a sad day we live in when manufacturers make a product as cheap as they can and still sell it. I've only used it once and it got the job done but I was upset with the quality. I work for a soft drink company ( 23 years ) and I've spent a lot of time in the back rooms of WalMarts and grocery chains so I know industrial mop buckets and mops. This ain't one. I thought for the price I would be getting good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Duclos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: This makes my life so much easier. I have to mop around 2,000 square feet regularly as I have three dogs and this product follows me through the house and wrings a mop thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Teya

customer_reviews.title: Looks tough but can't take a squeeze
customer_reviews.text: We've had multiple mop buckets we've used at the school for years but this one barely lasted one week before the metal part bent while ringing out a mop. The picture shows the bent metal after one of the first days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwhat

customer_reviews.title: Not all that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty much disappointed with the quality of the ringer rather flimsy bends when you go to squeeze out mop. Would not recommend buying this product better off spending the extra $20 and getting a Rubbermaid commercial mop bucket
customer_reviews.author: kenneth avery

customer_reviews.title: This is the best floor mop bucket that I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor mop bucket that I have owned. The squeezer for the mop doesn't break off if you apply too much pressure like the last one I used. This is a great product and for this price I really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JeanA

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are always popping off. They don't attach! Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: This is very bad!!! The part where it is dupposed to press the mop to squish out the water is horrible!! The metal sticks bend so it only squishes one side od the mop it it very very bad quality please do not buy
customer_reviews.author: karelia

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Springs were weak and crooked when received, one already broke and I haven’t even used it much.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Sandman

customer_reviews.title: Big but masterful in completing tasks
customer_reviews.text: A bit big for my home, but I keep it in the garage and also mopped up the snow slush/water that the car carries in and melts. Took and hour, but this is the first year in decades I didn't have to have that black street mud in the garage floor. Looks like new. Very happy with this. Great wringer, huge bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop bucket! I always wanted one because it was getting hard and painful to wring out my mop with my wrists and hands. This bucket is easy to use, no pain now while taking care of my mop and floors! Best cleaning tool I have
customer_reviews.author: Kori Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great wish i had bought it sooner. Really beats trying to wring the mop out by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Burnie W. McLain

customer_reviews.title: not as sturdy as hoped
customer_reviews.text: the wavebreaks are so expensive and I was hoping this would be a good alternative... def not as sturdy as the rubbermaid. every time we wring out a mop we are concerned that the whole thing will tip over. won't be purchasing another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The handle doesn’t wring out mop head very easily or thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: Works. The handle doesn’t wring out mop head very easily or thoroughly. Kind of difficult to use in comparison to others I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is basically useless. This WILL NOT work with your everyday common ...
customer_reviews.text: unless you also purchase the MASSIVE MOP, this is basically useless. This WILL NOT work with your everyday common household mop
customer_reviews.author: DMalone

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We had our garage floor replaced this spring and had it epoxy coated. Since it looks so nice I wanted a mop bucket to keep it clean. I had not used one like this since I was a kid working in restaurant. It is very well built and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wernicke

customer_reviews.title: PSA: This is JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: PSA: This is JUNK. DO NOT BUY. Also, would not let me return.
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Guy

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bucket for a mop to clean the tile throughout the house.. This bucket works well with the wringer and fits in the place where I store it. I am satisfied with this product. It is a sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: djg49

customer_reviews.title: Ideal mop bucket. Make sure your mom is as good as the bucket!😊.
customer_reviews.text: My dear wife wanted a mop bucket that would assist in wringing out the moon and was easy to move about, even when full of water. This item does all that!
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my parents and they are very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: william tucker jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home because I dont have the strength in my hands anymore to ring a mop! Upside is kids can mop.now too
customer_reviews.author: Me'shell  Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When you wring out the mop it leaks all overthe floor.
customer_reviews.author: joy lenhard

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like that its pretty sturdy but at first it would spill water when squeezing it but i figured out how to stop that. You have to place mop extended squeeze on time then put it completely in wringer and do it again.
customer_reviews.author: LucyD

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my office and it works great. We mop multiple times a day and it is very sturdy and nice thick plastic. i would recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a mechanic and uses this to clean his stall at the shop. It is about 2 months old now and is holding up great. And he is not easy on it.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mop Bucket!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a good value and good quality mop bucket as well. It's better than I expected and if needed I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery W. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and easier than carrying a mop bucket.
customer_reviews.author: rehabber

customer_reviews.title: Industrial
customer_reviews.text: Not chesp plastic. I use it all the time in my workshop.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: It gets  'er done
customer_reviews.text: This bucket and string mop wringer outer is great. I never had so much fun cleaning the kitchen and bathroom floors before
customer_reviews.author: Charles A

customer_reviews.title: Big.
customer_reviews.text: A little to big for the house but seems like it should last.
customer_reviews.author: tomp

customer_reviews.title: I use it weekly.
customer_reviews.text: Great home purchase! Sturdy & easy to use. Had it for over 6 months and it’s holding up well. Still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Better than I expected. Really heavy duty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Makes cleaning a lot less of a hassle. I purchased this for home. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality product, It’s leaking, doesn’t work properly.. Regret purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good bucket. The wringer works great, and it has a good capacity.
customer_reviews.author: OBE

customer_reviews.title: Great price tho
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and did not even get to finish the floor look at the color of the water. I purchased this just for light kitchen and wood floor use. I really hope they will take it back! If you are looking for a industrial strength this is not it. I was doing the kitchen floor and was not even pushing hard on it. You don't have to on micro fiber NO way this unit will handle a standard cotton mop. I have ones at work I could put my whole body weight on and that's no joke. Great price tho. Even tho it took a month for it to be shipped to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Robbert S.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Just spend the money and buy the heavy duty one, the plastic ringer gives after use.
customer_reviews.author: Rico F.

customer_reviews.title: mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. I just don't like how flimsy it is. It is harder to ring out. It will get the job done, just not one I would have to do an everyday job.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Does exactly what I was needing
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Does exactly what I was needing. We've had no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I use the product for my household cleaning. When arthritis no longer allowed my to wring out a mop of rag, this was my solution!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality and cheaper then any store I've been to-a Great Deal hands down!
customer_reviews.author: paul g bachhuber

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as sturdy as the Rubbermaid version, but acceptable for light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Long

customer_reviews.title: Can't even find this in stores I swear!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work and it was delivered in two days! It works great!
customer_reviews.author: J Mercado

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leaks out the back when you squeeze the mop! Water is everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: laura fazio

customer_reviews.title: This is way better than I had anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! This is way better than I had anticipated. The quality is excellent! I highly recommend it. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shipping was super and well
customer_reviews.text: It's completely what I needed and well made, shipping was super and well packed
customer_reviews.author: t.mcd

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a little but great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But seems to leak out the back when squeezing mop out. I don’t mind it though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: not very good for a rolling mop bucket
customer_reviews.text: The casters keep falling off, not very good for a rolling mop bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: It is made of very heavy duty plastic and seems very sturdy. The wheels roll easily
customer_reviews.text: My Geniuine Joe wringer mop bucket arrived on time. It was packaged well. It is made of very heavy duty plastic and seems very sturdy. The wheels roll easily. The wringer wrings my mop nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted an industrial type durable mop bucket
customer_reviews.author: myra L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this, it is big and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: It is made from thin plastic ,so when squeeze the mop entire bucket is moving and you cannot squeeze very well.This is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I use it to mop my garage floor
customer_reviews.author: John Warters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item same as home Depot just cheaper. Not heavy and well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, useful mop bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bucket. I have 8 dogs and two cats and mop several times daily. This makes my job much easier. I would recommend this to anyone who has a lot to mop. I love that it rolls and I never get my hands wet!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheap bucket, water floods out the back when ringing the mop because they didn't put a water Chanel so excess would run back into the bucket. Plastic feels like it's gonna break when you ring mop.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hall

customer_reviews.title: Like the pro's do...  if you have a big job, this is the way to go about it!
customer_reviews.text: rolls easily, very stable so long as it's on the floor. Heavily weighted to the one side, so when you lift it's not easy to keep it balanced.
customer_reviews.author: YsLadyMN

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This mop bucket doesn't fully dry the mop, and the water container doesn't work well with the side drying squeezer, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: xingye

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: Wringer cracked after 3 days usage. Does not wring out water very well. Still had to hand wring to get most of water out. On a positive note shipping was fast. It seems they wanted to get it off their hands as soon as possible. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: donna f

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best present I ever bought my wife. I enjoy watching her mop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Genuine Joe GJO02347 Side Press Wringer Mop Bucket, Yellow
product_meta.description: Mop bucket and wringer combo features a 35-quart capacity for a more efficient way to clean large areas. Higher back reduces strain to allow comfortable wringing. Lower front offers easier placement of mops to prevent back strain. Smooth surface lets you quickly wipe down the exterior to maintain sanitary use. Nonmarking casters roll smoothly across floors for effortless mobility. Large-capacity wringer accommodates 12 to 32 oz. mops (sold separately).
